name: Rivet
description:
This game and everything in it, from the animations to the music, was made by one person in 5 days for the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam. 

Jam theme: "What is hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw".

Game Description
Explore an atmospheric, snowy world as Rivet, a cute steampunk robot, as you uncover the secrets hidden beneath the snow.

Game Controls

Keyboard:
W, S, A, & D or the Arrow Keys to move
Spacebar or J to jump
U or Right Click to pick up
Hold H or Left Click to use radiator

Xbox Controller:
Left Stick to move
A to jump
Y to pick up
Hold X to use radiator
